full_output.summary: Full Stack Developer with expertise in front-end and back-end development, experienced in building products that solve real world problems and machine learning applications.

projects.name: Music Recommendation Algorithm using DBSCAN
projects.description: Extracted relevant features from music data using the Spotify API and optimized the algorithm by tuning hyperparameters, such as epsilon () and minimum points (minPts), to improve clustering performance.

experiences.description: Developed and launched MyStranger.in, a Django based social networking website, which attracted over 10,000 unique site visits and gained more than 1,300 registered users. Developed and launched Mentos Autotyper, a Windows application that quickly became popular among Galgotias University students and gathered over 8,000 downloads within first 3 months of its release.

full_output.name: SHREYANS SINGH
